name: Evaristo el Punky
overview: In the underworld and slums of Punkland our friend lived happily Evaristo and his girl, until the fateful day when she also appeared there fearsome rock band, which frightened the peaceful inhabitants and even they got to kidnap Evaristo's girl, this exploded the patience of He and went to the streets to the rescue (there are still heroes). Therefore, Evaristo must overcome the innumerable dangers of the great city, fight them and the evil Rockers and finally find their way to where they have their girl, then, once next to her, cut their chains and Punkylandia will be free again and you will live happy the rest of your days in your city and with your girl.
